outputs.output_descr: Developing the Protected Area System of Armenia: Improving capacity building and management

project_descr: The project’s component will focus upon(2) institutional capacity building by piloting a suite of Sanctuary management tools largely absent from Armenian’s current protected area management regime.
project_title: PIMS 3986 BD MSP WWF: PA system development
